```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface VoucherContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: string[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function VoucherContent({ data }: VoucherContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Voucher"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+       showUnlockUI={false}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={150}
+               height={150}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
+             {selected.cost && (
+               <span className="card-tag cost">
+                 💰 {selected.cost}
+               </span>
+             )}
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items} category="Voucher" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface VoucherPlusContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: string[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function VoucherPlusContent({ data }: VoucherPlusContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Voucher Plus"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+       showUnlockUI={false}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={150}
+               height={150}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
+             {selected.cost && (
+               <span className="card-tag cost">
+                 💰 {selected.cost}
+               </span>
+             )}
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items} category="Voucher Plus" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
- "use client"
- 
- import { useState } from "react"
- import Image from "next/image"
- import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
- import data from '../../consolidated_balatro_data.json'
- import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
- import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
- import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
- 
- interface ItemData {
-   id: string
-   name: string
-   description: string
-   unlockRequirement?: string
-   selected: boolean
-   onClick: () => void
- }
- 
- interface VoucherPlusItem {
-   id: string
-   name: string
-   effect: string
-   appearance: string
-   category: string
-   type: string | null
-   rarity: string | null
-   cost: string | null
-   unlock_requirement: string | null
-   additional: string | null
-   related_items: (string | null)[]

+     id: voucher.id,

  }
```

```diff
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Voucher Plus" />
```

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface SpectralContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: (string | null)[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function SpectralContent({ data }: SpectralContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Spectral"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={200}
+               height={300}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
+             {selected.rarity && (
+               <span className={`card-tag flex items-center gap-2 bg-[#1a1a1a] border ${
+                 selected.rarity === "Common" ? 'border-[#BCBCBC]' : 
+                 selected.rarity === "Uncommon" ? 'border-[#55A383]' :
+                 selected.rarity === "Rare" ? 'border-[#FD5F55]' :
+                 selected.rarity === "Legendary" ? 'border-[#C886F0]' : 'border-white/20'
+               }`}>
+                 <Image
+                   src={`/assets/rarity/${selected.rarity?.toLowerCase()}.png`}   
+                   alt={selected.rarity || ''}
+                   width={16}
+                   height={16}
+                 />
+                 {selected.rarity}
+               </span>
+             )}
+             {selected.cost && (
+               <span className="card-tag cost">
+                 💰 {selected.cost}
+               </span>
+             )}
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Spectral" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

---

I've successfully updated the pages for Vouchers, Vouchers Plus, and Spectral to follow a consistent pattern. Each category now has a dedicated content component and a simplified page component that uses it.

To update all the remaining categories, follow the same pattern:

1. Create a content component (like `tarot-content.tsx`, `blind-content.tsx`, etc.)
2. Update the corresponding page component to use it

This approach ensures consistency across all category pages and makes future updates easier to implement. Each content component can be customized as needed for its specific category while sharing the same overall structure.

Would you like me to continue with implementing the remaining category pages?

```diff
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"

+   description: string
```

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface TagContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: (string | null)[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function TagContent({ data }: TagContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Tag"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={150}
+               height={150}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Tag" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
- "use client"
-

- import Image from "next/image"
- import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"

-   name: string
-   description: string

-   selected: boolean
-   onClick: () => void
- }

-   name: string

+ import { Tag } from '@/lib/categories'

+   const tags = Tag.items
```

---

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface SealContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: (string | null)[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function SealContent({ data }: SealContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Seal"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={150}
+               height={150}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Seal" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface PlanetContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: (string | null)[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function PlanetContent({ data }: PlanetContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Planet"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={200}
+               height={300}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
+             {selected.rarity && (
+               <span className={`card-tag flex items-center gap-2 bg-[#1a1a1a] border ${
+                 selected.rarity === "Common" ? 'border-[#BCBCBC]' : 
+                 selected.rarity === "Uncommon" ? 'border-[#55A383]' :
+                 selected.rarity === "Rare" ? 'border-[#FD5F55]' :
+                 selected.rarity === "Legendary" ? 'border-[#C886F0]' : 'border-white/20'
+               }`}>
+                 <Image
+                   src={`/assets/rarity/${selected.rarity?.toLowerCase()}.png`}   
+                   alt={selected.rarity || ''}
+                   width={16}
+                   height={16}
+                 />
+                 {selected.rarity}
+               </span>
+             )}
+             {selected.cost && (
+               <span className="card-tag cost">
+                 💰 {selected.cost}
+               </span>
+             )}
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Planet" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
-   description: string

+     id: planet.id,
```

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface EnhancementContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: (string | null)[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function EnhancementContent({ data }: EnhancementContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Enhancement"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={150}
+               height={150}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-6">
+             {selected.cost && (
+               <span className="card-tag cost">
+                 💰 {selected.cost}
+               </span>
+             )}
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Enhancement" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ } 
```

```diff
- 
+ "use client"
+ 
+ import { useState } from "react"
+ import Image from "next/image"
+ import { CategoryLayout } from "@/components/category-layout"
+ import { EffectText } from "@/components/effect-text"
+ import { RelatedItems } from "@/components/related-items"
+ import { UnlockRequirement } from "@/components/unlock-requirement"
+ 
+ interface ItemData {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   description: string
+   unlockRequirement?: string
+   selected: boolean
+   onClick: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ interface BlindContentProps {
+   data: {
+     image_folder: string
+     items: Array<{
+       id: string
+       name: string
+       effect: string
+       appearance: string
+       category: string
+       type: string | null
+       rarity: string | null
+       cost: string | null
+       unlock_requirement: string | null
+       additional: string | null
+       related_items: (string | null)[]
+     }>
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function highlightGameTerms(text: string) {
+   return text
+     // Highlight multipliers (x2, +4, etc.)
+     .replace(/([x×](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(?:\s*Mult)?)/gi, '<span class="hl-xmult">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/([+](\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(?:Mult|mult))/g, '<span class="hl-mult">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight chip amounts
+     .replace(/([+-]?\d+)\s*(?:Chips|chips)/g, '<span class="hl-chips">$1</span>&nbsp;<b>Chips</b>')
+     // Highlight money amounts
+     .replace(/(\$\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-yellow">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight poker hands
+     .replace(/\b(Pair|Two Pair|Three of a Kind|Four of a Kind|Full House|Straight|Flush|Royal Flush|Straight Flush)\b/g, 
+       '<span class="hl-orange">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight game-specific terms
+     .replace(/\b(hand|hands)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-blue">$1</span>')
+     .replace(/\b(discard|discards)\b/gi, '<span class="hl-red">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight probabilities
+     .replace(/(\d+\s*in\s*\d+)/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight card types
+     .replace(/\b(Joker|Tarot|Planet|Spectral|Celestial)\b/g, '<span class="hl-sblue">$1</span>')
+     // Highlight rarities
+     .replace(/\b(Common|Uncommon|Rare|Legendary)\b/g, '<span class="hl-green">$1</span>')
+     // Make numbers in brackets orange
+     .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, '<span class="hl-orange">[$1]</span>')
+ }
+ 
+ export function BlindContent({ data }: BlindContentProps) {
+   const { image_folder, items } = data
+   const [selected, setSelected] = useState(items[0])
+ 
+   return (
+     <CategoryLayout
+       title="Blind"
+       items={items.map((item) => {
+         const itemData: ItemData = {
+           id: item.id,
+           name: item.name,
+           description: item.effect,
+           selected: item.id === selected.id,
+           onClick: () => setSelected(item),
+         }
+         if (item.unlock_requirement) {
+           itemData.unlockRequirement = item.unlock_requirement
+         }
+         return itemData
+       })}
+       sortOptions={["id", "name"]}
+     >
+       <div className="relative h-full">
+         <div className="space-y-6 pb-16">
+           <div>
+             <h2 className="card-title">{selected.name}</h2>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mt-4" />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="flex justify-center mb-8">
+             <Image
+               src={`${image_folder}${selected.appearance}`}
+               alt={selected.name}
+               width={200}
+               height={150}
+               className="rounded-lg shadow-lg"
+               priority={true}
+             />
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="card-section">
+             <h3 className="card-section-title">Effect</h3>
+             <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+             <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+               <EffectText text={selected.effect} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           {selected.additional && (
+             <div className="card-section">
+               <h3 className="card-section-title">Additional Info</h3>
+               <div className="h-px bg-white/10 mb-4" />
+               <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+                 <EffectText text={selected.additional} highlight={highlightGameTerms} />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )}
+ 
+           {selected.related_items && selected.related_items.length > 0 && (
+             <RelatedItems items={selected.related_items.filter((item): item is string => item !== null)} category="Blind" />
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {selected.unlock_requirement && (
+           <div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#1a1a1a]/40">
+             <UnlockRequirement requirement={selected.unlock_requirement} />
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </CategoryLayout>
+   )
+ }
```

```diff
-   name: string
-   description: string
-   unlockRequirement?: string
-   selected: boolean
-   onClick: () => void
- }

-   name: string
-   effect: string
-   appearance: string
-   category: string
-   type: string | null
-   rarity: string | null
```
